info.description: This is the API documentation for the Orkys API Gateway
info.title: Orkys API

get.description: Returns a list of customers with pagination.

200.description: The customer list and pagination details

post.description: Creates a new customer with the provided details.

get.description: Returns a customer by ID with all the details.

patch.description: Updates a customer with the provided details.

get.description: Returns a list of invoices with pagination.

200.description: The invoice list and pagination details

post.description: Creates a new invoice with the provided details.

get.description: Returns an invoice by ID with all the details.

patch.description: Updates an invoice with the provided details.

get.description: Returns a list of users, limited by a query param (default 10).

post.description: Authenticates a user with email and password and returns a JWT token.

200.description: Returns user information and tokens in cookies

get.description: Processes the OAuth callback from the provider, calls the user service, and returns a login response with JWT tokens.
get.summary: Process the OAuth callback from a provider

parameters.description: Authorization code (and any other provider parameters)
parameters.name: code

200.description: User login response with tokens in cookies

get.description: Initiates an OAuth flow (for providers "custom" or "google") by calling the user service and returning the providerâ€™s auth URL.
get.summary: Initiate an OAuth flow for a provider

parameters.description: Optional state parameter. If omitted, a new state will be generated.
parameters.name: state

get.description: Returns a list of quotes with pagination.

200.description: The quote object list, and pagination details

post.description: Creates a new quote with the provided details.

get.description: Returns a quote by ID with all the details.

patch.description: Updates a quote with the provided details.

get.description: Takes a refresh token and returns a new access token (and possibly a new refresh token).

200.description: New access/refresh token pair in http-only cookies

post.description: Creates a new user in the system and returns the user object with tokens.

201.description: Created user with tokens in cookies

patch.description: Updates the user details (first name, last name, password and avatar URL) if they are not empty.
